thread.title: Andrew W.K.’s New App Gives You a Bloody Nose
thread.title_full: Andrew W.K.’s New App Gives You a Bloody Nose

author: Pitchfork
title: Andrew W.K.’s New App Gives You a Bloody Nose
text:
Andrew W.K.’s New App Gives You a Bloody Nose Now’s your chance to look like the party icon's I Get Wet cover Andrew W.K. Photo by Andrew Benge/Redferns via Getty Images 
Ever want a portrait of yourself looking like Andrew W.K. on the cover of I Get Wet ? Now’s your chance. W.K. has announced his first smartphone app, the Party Hard Bloody Nose app, and it allows users to add a bloody nose to any photo, whether just taken or uploaded from a library. Other options include adding W.K.’s white T-shirt and hair to any photo, and purchasing a special animated “blood flow” custom GIF image. Download the app here . I released my first ever smartphone app about partying... https://t.co/DZhZjr2UQr pic.twitter.com/xPM2FTiCCs — ANDREW W.K. (@AndrewWK) February 22, 2017 Artists In This Story
